# File test/integration_test.rb, line 339
    def s3_files_for attachment
      [:thumb, :medium, :large, :original].inject({}) do |files, style|
        data = `curl "#{attachment.url(style)}" 2>/dev/null`.chomp
        t = Tempfile.new("paperclip-test")
        t.binmode
        t.write(data)
        t.rewind
        files[style] = t
        files
      end
    end
